title: Smoke Test Dataset - MC
description: This synthetic dataset presents a multiclass classification problem based on two types of features and a target with three classes. Each sample in the dataset has a unique identifier, a set of two features (color, number), and a target class label.

id.name: id
id.description: Unique identifier for each sample in the dataset.

features.name: color
features.description: A categorical feature, with three possible values: Red, Green, and Blue

features.name: number
features.description: Values drawn from a uniform distribution between 1 and 100 inclusive
